title: Reset your password
subtitle: Create a new password for your account
input1.minlength: Password must contain at least 5 characters

server.auth.error.invalid_uuid: Your link appears to have expired, please regenerate a new one.
server.auth.ok.mail.sent: Password reset sent! Please check your emails.
server.auth.auth.error.wrong_email: The email is not referenced in our database.
server.auth.error.bad_credentials: Your e-mail address and password do not match.
server.auth.error.disabled_account: Your account is no longer active.
server.auth.error.password_modification_failure: Your password could not be changed.
server.auth.ok.password_modified: Your password has been successfully changed.
server.auth.error.wrong_email: There is no account matching this email.
server.auth.ok.valid_uuid: Access link to the valid page.
server.auth.error.expired_uuid: Your link to this page has expired.
